data.text:
@cycletherapyHam Hope he is Ok.
Your are very misguided in blaming others. The mask, vaccine and other mandates donâ€™t work and also have a very human cost.
@cycletherapyHam I am sorry to hear this, stay strong 💙💪
@cycletherapyHam You know triple jabbed mask compliant people test positive for covid all the time, right? Covid gets into hospitals constantly, where everyone is wearing a surgical mask.

@cycletherapyHam Hope your brother stays healthy. The government doesn't care about vulnerable populations. They just don't.  I've been banging my head against the wall for the past few years advocating on behalf of my son with multiple disabilities.

We got the phone call from the staff at Community Living because we all went out for lunch on Friday. They can't tell us when the person worked or how much contact they had with the residents in the home.
